brief_description: Specific Aim 1 (Discover) Genome-Wide Association Study [GWAS];Specific Aim 2 (Replicate) Targeted Association Studies;Specific Aim 3:  (Validate)  Functional Studies
endpoints: To determine the direct effects and/or downstream functional consequences on immune outcomes of replicated polymorphisms (SNPs and HLA alleles) that we have identified in the US, San Diego, and Rochester Cohorts.
hypothesis: To test the hypothesis that individual SNPs are significantly associated with variations in humoral (neutralizing antibody) and cell-mediated (IFN-g ELISPOT) measures of MV immunity
objectives: To replicate the individual SNPs, multigenic/haplotypic SNP interactions, and gene pathway/networks discovered in Aim 1 in an independent cohort of subjects (San Diego Cohort)
